headline: Schneider Electric and Digital Realty Announce $373M Supply Capacity Agreement to Meet Rising Data Center Demand
summary: Schneider Electric, a global energy technology leader, today announced that Digital Realty, (NYSE: DLR) the leading global provider of carrier-neutral data center, colocation, and interconnection solutions, has signed a $373 million Supply Capacity Agreement (SCA) for Uninterruptible Power Supply (UPS), Low Voltage Switchgear (LVS), and Pre-Fabricated Skids. The announcement was unveiled at Schneider Electric's Innovation Summit North America in Las Vegas, convening more than 2,500 business lead

headline: Digital Realty Trust (DLR) Boosts Revenue Forecast Following Strong Q3 Results and Record Re-Leasing Gains
summary: Digital Realty Trust, Inc. (NYSE:DLR) ranks among the best sustainability stocks to invest in. Freedom Capital Markets maintained its Buy rating on Digital Realty Trust, Inc. (NYSE:DLR) and increased its price objective from $198 to $205 on October 27 following the company’s third-quarter 2025 results. For the third consecutive quarter, the data center REIT upped […]

headline: Digital Realty Trust (DLR) Sets Leasing Records Amid Hyperscaler Pause Is AI Demand Driving Durable Growth?
summary: Digital Realty Trust recently reported strong second-quarter 2025 results, setting records for lease commencements and raising its full-year guidance for core Funds From Operations. The company's launch of a US$3.0 billion hyperscale data center fund and a record US$919 million backlog in signed leases highlight rising AI-driven demand and reinforce its growth visibility despite short-term moderation in hyperscaler leasing activity. We'll explore how Digital Realty Trust’s significant...
